subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Wichita State was looser than one might expect before its matchup with No. 2 Ohio State. But the Shockers’ game plan is simple: step up rebounding and stop the Buckeyes’ Deshaun Thomas.
snippet: Wichita State was looser than one might expect before its matchup with No. 2 Ohio State. But the Shockers’ game plan is simple: step up rebounding and stop the Buckeyes’ Deshaun Thomas.
